attributes.action: make MPs repay profits made from tax-payer funded homes.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: MPs are being pressed to pay the CGT on profits made from 'second home' financed properties. By taking out interest-only mortgages the taxpayers are meeting the costs but politicians are reaping the profits. This can run into hundreds of thousands of pounds in each case. With voters losing homes due to the government's loose regulation of the financial markets, why is this money not being returned to the public purse.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
